verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Take me through another trial. In the end I know I'll smile.
It's for this thing that I long, to be rid of all my wrong.
As I learn to cease from sin my Lord says I am coming in.
I'm gonna change you and make you just like me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord is teaching me to walk in the Spirit.
He has given me His mind that I might see.
And although the path seems dark I can continue.
I just walk upon the words He speaks to me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I have seen a lot of Christians who won't follow,
The precious words my Savior speaks to me.
They would rather walk along an easy pathway.
As for me, I'll surely take that higher way.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The Lord is taking us through a lot of suffering.
But it's necessary, you see, to reign with Him.
As He lifts us up and shows us what He's doing.
His face gets brighter and this world gets mighty dim.
